post_text: Three years ago today, the state of Lousiana was hit with a catastrophic flood. Approximately 6.9 trillion gallons of rainfall hit the state, and over 300 NHA family members from Advantage and Inspire Charter Academies were impacted. The NHA family, and our schools, stepped in to provide a safe haven for the community and helped start the healing process. #NHAmazing
text: Three years ago today, the state of Lousiana was hit with a catastrophic flood. post_text: Teacher Appreciation Week was last week and we think teachers + puppies = pure bliss! Well done Prevail Academy! #NHAmazing
shared_text:
Wag 'N' Tails Dog Activity Center is at Prevail Academy.
May 10, 2019 at 2:55 PM · Mount Clemens, MI ·

For #teacherappreciationweek and #fosterfriday, a few fosters in the Wag program and employees took a trip to Prevail Academy! Providing some deserving teachers with adoptable pups is a great way to end the week! 🐶☺️ Adoptable Kaizyr, adoptable Bindi, and adoptable Hunter had so much fun and sure are tuckered out now 💜 @ Prevail Academy
text:
Teacher Appreciation Week was last week and we think teachers + puppies = pure bliss! Well done Prevail Academy! #NHAmazing

May 10, 2019 at 2:55 PM · Mount Clemens, MI ·

For #teacherappreciationweek and #fosterfriday, a few fosters in the Wag program and employees took a trip to Prevail Academy! Providing some deserving teachers with adoptable pups is a great way to end the week! 🐶☺️ Adoptable Kaizyr, adoptable Bindi, and adoptable Hunter had so much fun and sure are tuckered out now 💜 @ Prevail Academy
